feed.title: Google Cloud: Identity-Aware Proxy
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Identity-Aware Proxy

entry.content:
The ability to use a path wildcard in the aud (audience) field when using a service account JWT to authenticate with an IAP-secured resource is generally available.

For more information, see Authenticate with a service account JWT
entry.summary: You can now use a path wildcard for the audience field when authenticating with a service account JWT. This feature is generally available and simplifies authentication to IAP-secured resources.
entry.title: Feature: Path wildcard in audience field for service account JWT authentication is now generally available
